channel.title: Need help with this quick, and foronce im begging!
channel.description:
First of all and by far the worst, People are appearing to NoClip, but they are not doing it, and the appear to be far away, or in a wall but if i log out and then back in their standing rite next to me!
^^ Most important ^^ i will award a admin spot on my server if you can solve
another problem
People on my server are told time after time to stop swearing, and i cant just ban people for it, its to much of a minor offense (i dont want to act like jagex now). Is their a way i can give some sort of punishment like, a Word Filter, but for words in put into it, Eg Ifplayersays"Hello" replacewith "*****" or something.
And final problem, Spells need runes, if you can solve, Admin spot on server. (this is a urgent needed code)
~Tricky~

item.title: Need help with this quick, and foronce im begging!
item.dc:creator: @grafix_my_game grafix my game
item.description:
@grafix_my_game wrote:

find a tut on muting for second one on first one i pretty sure it non-fixable and ur probably using pimpscape source if that is happeneing btw it is just basic lag and people’s computers can catch up 3rd one i pretty sure u need to go find each spell and change them to you dont need runes but i dont know becoz mage isnt cool if u dont got runes!

Read full topic
